---
title: Conference venue
---

The conference venue is located at the **National Film and Sound Archive** (NFSA), situated in the heart of Canberra on McCoy Circuit, Acton, between Lake Burley Griffin and The Australian National University

See [**here**](https://www.nfsa.gov.au/visit-us#how-to-get-to-the-nfsa-in-canberra) for how to get to the NFSA in Canberra.

The **registration desk**, located near the Mccoy Circuit entrance, will be open 30 minutes before the first talk from Tuesday 24th Nov to Friday 28th Nov. 

![](/images/nfsa-wheelchair-map.jpg)


The talks will be at **Arc Cinema** and **Theatrette**, located on the right side from the Mccoy Circuit entrance. 

The posters will be displayed in the **Gallery** located on the left side from the Mccoy Circuit entrance.
